title: Please Riot help ASAP cant install LoL
body:
I just performed a format on my WIndows 10 PC, so i tried to reinstall LoL
at one step of the installation process it says "Source file not found: C:\Uders\Chris\AppData\Roaming\Riot Games\League of Legends 4.2.1\install\disk.cab. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it." So i did just what the error message asked, ichecked if the file exists, which it did and there where a bunch of patch loaders and stuff in there, but still i cant go beyond that step.
Please i need some help to fix this!!!
League is life

replies.body:
It sounds like your reinstallation of League is running into some issues due to temporarily files. I recommend grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), checking the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall*, then hit the **START** button.

After the process finishes, try launching League to complete the patching process. Let me know if this worked.
